global_test.comment: Set 'aaa accounting' to log all privileged use commands using 'command 15'
Set 'username secret' for all local users
Set maximimum value for 'ip ssh authentication-retries'
Set 'ip tftp source-interface' to the Loopback Interface

section_test.comment: Set login authentication for line tty
Set 'transport input ssh' for 'line vty' connections
Set 'exec-timeout' to less than or equal to 10 minutes for 'line aux 0'
Set 'exec-timeout' to less than or equal to 10 minutes 'line console 0'

snmp_test.comment: Set 'no snmp-server' to disable SNMP when unused
Create an 'access-list' for use with SNMP

snmpcommunity_test.comment: Do not set 'RW' for any 'snmp-server community'
Set the ACL for each 'snmp-server community' (IPv4)
Set the ACL for each 'snmp-server community' (IPv6)

snmpgroup_test.comment: Set 'priv' for each 'snmp-server group' using SNMPv3

snmpuser_test.comment: Require 'aes 128' as minimum for 'snmp-server user' when using SNMPv3

bgpneighbor_test.comment: All BGP Neighbors have a Password
